sentences.sContent: He scanned the horizon, but there was no sign of the ship.
sentences.sCn: 他朝地平线处仔细眺望，但是找不到那艘船的踪影。

sentences.sContent: She scanned his face, looking for signs of what he was thinking.
sentences.sCn: 她端详着他的脸，想知道他在想些什么。

sentences.sContent: Video cameras scanned the car park.
英文例句:You scan the text into the computer, then edit it.
sentences.sCn: 把文本扫描进电脑，然后进行编辑。

sentences.sContent: ...The researchers also note that dogs scan faces as a whole to sense how people are feeling...

...Someday a stranger will read your e-mail without your permission or scan the Website you've visited，Or perhaps someone will casually glance through your credit card purchases or cell phone bills to find out your shopping preferences or calling habits...

exam.question: The captain ________ the horizon for approaching ships.

answer.explain: 句意：  船长扫视着海平线上来往的船只。 scrutinize：  仔细检查； explore：  探测； sweep：  扫视， 搜索。

synos.tran: 扫描；浏览；细看；详细调查；标出格律
